comments.body: ~~version added or 'starting in 2.1' is needed so people don't try using it on older versions~~

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +40,44 @@still be skipped even if it has a `always_run` clause evaluated to
true. 

Also if you want to skip, or ignore errors on some tasks in check mode
you can use a boolean magic variable `ansible_check_mode` (added in version 2.1)
